author: coldcolgate
content: I'm trying to play around with constructing beacon chain proofs using the eth2spec python library.  However, it doesn't seem like the eth2spec 1.1.10 has anything after phase 0/1.  When will bellatrix and capella specs be added?

author: ralexstokes
content: not sure if we are actively maintaining releases e.g. via PyPI, but you can always just grab from source
